markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ghost Eater Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2710) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Fists of the Ruby Phoenix</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Eater](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=92)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) or Trained in [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)

</column>

---

You have trained as a ghost eater, a hunter specialized in the destruction of spirits. You know how to channel your own spiritual energy to harm spirits. Your weapon and unarmed attack Strikes become [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103). Against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures, they also gain the effects of a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune.

**Special** You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from this archetype.

<title level="2">Ghost Eater Dedication leads to...</title>
[Cross the Threshold](/Feats.aspx?ID=2713), [Disrupting Strikes](/Feats.aspx?ID=2712), [Reach Beyond](/Feats.aspx?ID=2711)
name: Ghost Eater Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Occultism or Trained in Religion
